name: Kick Jump Fighter - Play Free 8-bit Retro Pixel Fighting Games
name_original: Kick Jump Fighter - Play Free 8-bit Retro Pixel Fighting Games
description:
Love/hate Flappy Bird? You will love/hate this game! :)

Game Features:

* 8-bit art style and retro look
* Play with just one tap
* Very fast and challenging game play
* Easy to play, but hard to master
* Game Center integrated for more fun
* FREE... everything is there at no price

This cute indie game is absolutely awesome!
